base_description: Brown wooden desk with black top and drawers.
part_description: Six drawers, two columns, side door, black top, curved backboard.
internal_interaction_description: The drawers slide in and out within their respective columns, providing storage space. The side door opens to reveal an additional compartment. The black top serves as a flat surface, while the curved backboard adds structural support.
external_interaction_description: The desk provides a surface for writing or placing items. It can be positioned against a wall or in an office. The drawers and door allow for organized storage of office supplies or personal items, enhancing functionality in a workspace.
